mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, create_date AS createDate, account_num AS accountNum, address, address_detail AS addressDetail, zip_code AS zipCode, email, name, login_id AS loginId, password, phone, refresh_token AS refreshToken, simple_password AS simplePassword, is_admin AS isAdmin FROM users WHERE login_Id = #{loginId}
SELECT nyang_id AS nyangId, create_date AS createDate, money, user_id AS userId FROM nyang_coin WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM coin_history WHERE nyang_id = #{nyangId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT history_id AS historyId, create_date AS createDate, total_amt AS totalAmt, trans_amt AS transAmt, trans_type AS transType, nyang_id AS nyangId FROM coin_history WHERE nyang_id = #{nyangId} ORDER BY create_date DESC, history_id DESC ) t WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRow}
